name: Vojago
description:
Vojago is a puzzle platformer about Salem, a character grieving the loss of a loved one. 

CONTROLS

Fullscreen is better for the UI
Arrows for movement
Space to jump
Espace for checkpoints and quit
E to talk to the birb then click on the dialogue then Return 

First year project game made in Unity for our graphics class.

Milia Barrière  -  Unity integration, code, music
Lucie Bourrier - 2D Art, environment 
Clarisse Bré - Animation, character design
Gabriele Ennaouaji - 2D Art, environment
Virgil Markus - Sound design, music, writing
